Simulate seroincidence

Source: R/simulate_seroincidence.R
simulate_seroincidence.Rd

Simulate seroincidence

Usage

simulate_seroincidence(
  nrep = 100,
  n_sim = 10,
  sr_params,
  renew.params = TRUE,
  antibodies = c("HlyE_IgA", "HlyE_IgG"),
  lambda = 0.01,
  lifespan = c(0, 10),
  dlims = rbind(HlyE_IgA = c(min = 0, max = 0.5), HlyE_IgG = c(min = 0, max = 0.5)),
  cond = tibble(antigen_iso = c("HlyE_IgG", "HlyE_IgA"), nu = c(0.5, 0.5), eps = c(0, 0),
    y.low = c(1, 1), y.high = c(5e+06, 5e+06))
)

Arguments

nrep

number of samples per simulated dataset

n_sim

number of simulations to run

sr_params

Curve parameters

renew.params

whether to sample new parameters for each infection in a simulated individual's longitudinal data

antibodies

which antibodies to simulate

lambda

Simulated incidence rate per person-year

lifespan

range of ages to simulate

dlims

biologic noise distribution

cond

Noise parameters

Value

a list of simulation results

Examples

simulate_seroincidence(sr_params = typhoid_curves_nostrat_100)
#> Error in future_map(1:n_sim, function(i) {    csdata <- sim.cs(curve_params = dmcmc, lambda = lambda, n.smpl = nrep,         age.rng = lifespan, antigen_isos = antibodies, n.mc = 0,         renew.params = renew.params, add.noise = TRUE, noise_limits = dlims,         format = "long")    est <- est_seroincidence(pop_data = csdata, sr_params = dmcmc,         noise_params = cond, lambda_start = 0.005, build_graph = TRUE,         verbose = FALSE, print_graph = FALSE, antigen_isos = antibodies)    list(csdata = csdata, est1 = est)}, .options = furrr_options(seed = TRUE)): could not find function "future_map"
